title: nmTeam 无障碍和辅助功能建议 / nmTeam accessibility suggestions
description:
nmTeam 团队乐于接受关于无障碍和辅助功能的建议。
请告诉我们您对 nmTeam 无障碍和辅助功能的期望，nmTeam 团队将根据您的期待改进我们的产品的无障碍和辅助功能。
nmTeam welcomes suggestions for accessibility of our products.
Please tell us what you expect from nmTeam accessibility, and nmTeam will improve the accessibility of our products according to your expectations.

questions.title: 请告诉我们您对 nmTeam 无障碍和辅助功能的建议。
questions.description:
Let us know your suggestions for nmTeam accessibility.
nmTeam 团队对您的建议不胜感激，并将仔细考虑您的看法。
nmTeam appreciates your suggestions for accessibility of our products.
We will carefully consider your opinion and make improvements accordingly.

questions.title: 请提供您的 nmTeam Account 昵称、UID 或用户名（如果有）。
questions.description: Please provide your nmTeam Account nickname, UID or username (if available).

questions.title: 请填写您的电子邮箱地址。
questions.description: Please fill in your email address.

questions.title: 您是否允许 nmTeam 团队进一步联系您取得更多信息？
questions.description: Do you allow nmTeam to contact you for further information?
